title: Colombia’s government and FARC’s former political chief announce peace talks
description:
Colombia’s government and former FARC commander “Ivan Marquez” of guerrilla group “Segundo Marquetalia” announced formal peace talks. In a joint press statement, Marquez and Peace Commissioner Otty Patiño said they…

The post Colombia’s government and FARC’s former political chief announce peace talks appeared first on Colombia News | Colombia Reports.
